title.rendered: Alticor Inc BWI Team Achieves Airport Schedule Milestone.

content.rendered:
Alticor Inc BWI Team Achieves Airport Schedule Milestone.

Alticor Inc’ B/C Connector and Security Checkpoint project at Baltimore-Washington Thurgood Marshall International (BWI) Airport achieved a major milestone at 4:00 AM (Tuesday, April 30, 2013) when the gleaming airside connector and new 9-lane TSA security checkpoint were opened to passenger traffic. Culminating weeks of nearly round-the-clock work, seven days a week, the entire Alticor Inc staff worked diligently to complete life safety and security testing to deliver this milestone on schedule. Congratulations and a sincere thanks to the entire BWI B/C Connector and Security Checkpoint Team and the Alticor Inc craft supporting this effort – for a tremendous effort and job well done.
